ITEM.DESCRIPT: Line Type for Table with Package Data

LOCAL.TYPES: *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* LOCAL HELPER CLASSES
LOCAL.MACROS: *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY MACRO DEFINITIONS YOU NEED *"* IN THE IMPLEMENTATION PART OF THE CLASS

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Get text attribute as standard table

ITEM.SOURCE: * SPLIT me->texts AT cl_abap_char_utilities=>newline * INTO TABLE text.

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Set text attribute from standard table

ITEM.SOURCE:
FIELD-SYMBOLS <l> LIKE LINE OF text. DATA str TYPE string.
* CLEAR me->text. * LOOP AT text ASSIGNING <l>. * str = <l>. * IF me->text IS INITIAL. * me->text = str. * ELSE. * CONCATENATE me->text cl_abap_char_utilities=>newline str INTO me->text. * ENDIF. * ENDLOOP.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_data. INCLUDE TYPE thead AS head. TYPES: selfdef TYPE dokil-selfdef, state TYPE dokhl-dokstate, typ TYPE dokhl-typ, END OF ts_data
begin of ts_text, Langu type sy-langu, _ type string, " Text end of ts_text
tt_rawtext TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tline WITH DEFAULT KEY
tt_text TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tline WITH DEFAULT KEY
tt_texts type SORTED TABLE OF ts_text with UNIQUE key langu
